summary: Resolved 3 conflicted files: (1) docs/concepts/fileguard/README.md — merged project structure and documentation sections from both branches, preserving AV Engine Adapter content from HEAD and Document Extraction/AuditService sections from origin/main; (2) fileguard/core/__init__.py — used HEAD's more descriptive package docstring; (3) tests/unit/test_clamav_adapter.py — used origin/main's test suite which tests the canonical ClamAVAdapter in fileguard/core/adapters/clamav_adapter.py (the newer implementation with AVEngineAdapter base class, Unix socket + TCP support, and is_available() method).
strategyUsed: Preserved both changes where possible: README merged all documentation sections from both branches into a coherent document; __init__.py chose the more descriptive HEAD docstring; test_clamav_adapter.py chose origin/main's version which tests the canonical newer adapter implementation (fileguard.core.adapters.clamav_adapter) that aligns with the AVEngineAdapter abstract interface defined in av_adapter.py
